describe: Senegal is a country located on the west coast of Africa. Known for its vibrant culture, rich history, and diverse landscapes, Senegal offers a unique blend of traditional and modern influences. The country is famous for its music, dance, and art, as well as its welcoming hospitality.

cities.name: üèù Dakar
cities.geographical_location: Located on the Cape Verde Peninsula, Dakar is the westernmost city on the African mainland.
cities.climate: Dakar has a hot semi-arid climate with a short rainy season and a long dry season.

cities.name: üèù Saint-Louis
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the northwest coast of Senegal, near the mouth of the Senegal River.
cities.climate: Saint-Louis has a tropical savanna climate with a distinct wet and dry season.

cities.name: üåÜ Ziguinchor
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Casamance region of southern Senegal.
cities.climate: Ziguinchor has a tropical climate with a wet season from June to October and a dry season from November to May.
